name: smart-book-translator
description: AI-powered document translator for personal use

scripts.install:all: cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install && cd ../electron && npm install
scripts.start: npm run build && npm run start:backend
scripts.electron:dev: npm run build:frontend && cd electron && npm start
scripts.electron:build: npm run build:frontend && cd electron && npm run dist
scripts.electron:build:win: npm run build:frontend && cd electron && npm run dist:win
scripts.electron:build:linux: npm run build:frontend && cd electron && npm run dist:linux
